usefulItems: frying pan, cocktail stick, long sharp knife, hob
title: Omelette Sticks

ingredients.content: ¼ - ½ tsp fine sea salt, to taste

preparations.content: Place kale in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside. Rinse mixing bowl.
Place chicken and oil in mixing bowl then fry <b>5 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Add mushrooms, cheese, eggs, salt and pepper then mix <b>15 sec//speed 2<b>.

Heat butter in a large frying pan over a medium heat then pour in omelette mixture from mixing bowl. Sprinkle chopped kale over the top and cook over a medium-low heat for approx. 7-8 minutes. Flip over and cook for a further 3-4 minutes until cooked and golden.

Transfer to a chopping board and cut into squares (3 cm). Pile 3 squares on top of each other and then secure with a cocktail stick. Continue until all squares are on sticks (makes  approx. 16 omelette sticks). Serve warm or cold.

hintsAndTricks: Alternatively, you can serve the omelette in slices.
